title: Are there months when you don't talk on the phone to anyone? - Quora

response.answer_text: I hardly ever talk on the phone. All my calls on my phone are from are like my boss or some appointments or something I might have. I pretty much never am talking to friends on the phone. That said I am the same with texting as well. Most of my talking to people is on FB messenger which a lot of the time I use my phone to do. I also use my phone’s camera a lot for work purposes. I use the internet on my phone a lot as well.

Yes. For me, however, I don’t really have anyone to text or call. There was this one girl who I was close with that would text me surprisingly and would talk all night. Unfortunately our friendship dissolved and I miss her a lot. I might get a text or a call once a month and if I’m lucky maybe two but generally I don’t have anybody.
